summary: Phase 2.3 Telegram Alerts Delivery testing completed. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend integration issues identified.

ui_bugs.issue: No proper admin login interface accessible from frontend
ui_bugs.selector: Connect button does not lead to admin login form

integration_issues.issue: Frontend expects endpoints that don't exist on backend
Continuous WebSocket connection failures to /ws endpoint
No frontend UI to access working Telegram admin APIs

passed_tests: Backend: All required alert types configurable - working
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Frontend-backend integration is broken. Frontend expects different API endpoints than what backend provides. Need to either: 1) Update frontend to use existing backend APIs (/api/admin/connections/telegram/*), or 2) Add missing frontend endpoints to backend (/api/frontend/dashboard, /api/system/health, etc.). Also need to implement proper admin login UI in frontend to access Telegram settings.
